Package org.knowceans.topics.simple

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISimpleGibbs
    Interface for simple Gibbs sampling implementations
    ISimplePpx
    ISimplePpx interface for simple perplexity calculations
    ISimpleQueryGibbs
    Interface for simple Gibbs query sampling implementations
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IldaGibbs
    LDA Gibbs sampler with nonparametric prior (HDP):
    LdaGibbs
    LDA Gibbs sampler: (m,k | alpha), (k,t | beta)
    LdaTopics
    LdaTopics shows the topics of an LDA-like model
    TopicMatrixPanel
    MatrixCorpus does two things: Generating a corpus for MxN topics that can be represented as rows and columns in a matrix, and displaying that matrix from given nkt.
